column4: Number of the experimental field (insert an integer number in ascending order from 1. Required if the same enterprise has more than one field)

column10: Field longitude (in degrees. Positive eastern Hemisphere, negative western  Hemisphere Example: 11.40)
column11: Field size (Enter the value in hectares)
column13: Annual average temperature in Â°C (If not known write -9999)

column16: Climatic Water Balance in mm. If not known write -9999)
column17: Soil depth (cm, integer number, if not known write -9999)
column21: Soil organic matter (% use dot for decimals)
column27: Density of trees in the present year (nr./ha)

column30: Tree/vine DBH (cm DBH= Diameter at Breast Height, namely 130 cm)
